headline: George Herbert Walker III, 88, an Ambassador and a Cousin of Presidents
abstract: A St. Louis businessman and philanthropist, he helped Republican politicians, including his cousins George H. W. and George W. Bush.
lead_paragraph: George Herbert Walker III, a cousin of two presidents, a former United States ambassador to Hungary and a prominent St. Louis businessman and philanthropist, died on Saturday at a hospice facility in St. Louis. He was 88.
